participant_1.background:
I haven't told my parents that I'm secretly training my collie to race.
i am a huge fan of dogs.
I'm still trying to figure out if my car is sentient or not.
i can tell right away if i m going to like someone.
I enjoy my quiet life and green tea.

participant_2.background:
I'm a bit of a loner, but I'm fiercely loyal to my friends and would do anything to protect them.
i am six feet tall.
i like candy and soda.
I once got to see the Red Hot Chili Peppers in concert! It was an amazing experience.
I love sharing my love of comic books and animals with others.

content.text: It's going pretty good! Just got back from work. How about yours?
It's been good! I just got home from walking my dog.
What kind of dog do you have?
I have a collie named Charlie! He's a really good boy.
I love collies! They're so smart and loyal.
They are! I'm trying to train him to race, but I'm not sure if he's going to be fast enough.
That's awesome! I wish I could train my dog to do something cool like that.
It's a lot of work, but it's also really rewarding.
I can imagine! I'm sure Charlie is really happy to be getting all that training.
He loves it! He's always excited to go for a walk or run.
That's great! I'm sure he's a great dog to have.
He is! I'm really lucky to have him.
It sounds like you two are a great match
